page.title: 20RECREATION AND LEISURE.
page.content: In answer to a questionnaire as to the most popular pastimes,with reason,in the home and elsewhere,the following information was obtained. {Home}Adult Male * Adult Female T.V.4 in every 5 * Reading 4/5 Music 2/5 * T.V.3/5 Reading 2/5 * Music 1/2 Male Child * Female Chld T.V.4/5 * T.V. 4/5 Board Games 2/5 * Reading 4/5 Music 2/5 * Board Games 3/5 {Elsewhere }Adult Male Adult Female Gardening 2/5 * Walking 4/5 Disco.dancing 2/5 * Meal 1/2 Drink 1/5 * Horse Riding 2/5 Male Child * Female Child Golf 4/5 * Skating 2/5 Football 3/5 * Horse Riding 3/10 Swimming 2/5 * Swimming 3/10. {Reasons}(totals) Enjoyment 70% Interest 18%.Socialisation 12%.
